main.bio: My name is Sonny, I'm a Full Stack ReactJS Developer. Currently I'm working at Clever Programmer while also coaching

resume.skillmessage: Here you can create a short write-up of your skills to show off to employers

work.title: Senior Frontend Developer
work.description: My experiences in two years work on cloud-based online fax service are :At first, I fixed bugs and added new features in the web application withAngularJS.Then I migrated the web application from AngularJS to ReactJS.Also, I developed fax add-ons with Google App Script that integrates with GSuite[Google Sheets, Docs, and Gmail].

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.
